title: FS: Tough/scarce N172 OJ  Jim McCormick  "Pittsburg" SOLD
author: Smokey Joe

posts.post_title: FS: Tough/scarce N172 OJ  Jim McCormick  "Pittsburg" SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling a really Tough OJ of Jim McCormick. Pulled from a notebook but front is in really nice shape.

Asking $750 which includes shipping...Would take a check/MO and paypal if sent as gift payment.
 

[url]vintagecards@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks...
